thread.title: Fans vote Saucon Valley's Nate Harka as Lehigh Valley's best WR
thread.title_full: Fans vote Saucon Valley's Nate Harka as Lehigh Valley's best WR

title: Fans vote Saucon Valley's Nate Harka as Lehigh Valley's best WR
text:
Saucon Valley wide receiver Nate Harka tackled from behind. (Jim Middlekauff | lehighvalleylive.com contributor) By Greg Joyce | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 14, 2015 8:00 AM 
The votes are in and the fans have picked Saucon Valley 's Nate Harka as the Lehigh Valley's best wide receiver . 
The senior brought in 28 percent of the voting to lead the 21 candidates. 
In six games, Harka is the Panthers' leading receiver with 16 receptions for 321 yards and three touchdowns. 
Stay tuned for the next fan vote to pick the Lehigh Valley's top quarterback.
